summary: At the end of WW2, a compassionate Dutch policeman helps smuggle a Jewish woman into British Palestine.
cast: Stephen Boyd|Dolores Hart|Leo McKern|Hugh Griffith|Donald Pleasence|Harry Andrews|Robert Stephens|Marius Goring|Finlay Currie|Harold Goldblatt|Neil McCallum|Geoffrey Keen|Jean Anderson|Michael David|Jane Jordan Rogers|Jack Gwillim|Arthur Gross|R.S.M. Brittain|Anne Dickins|Vi Stevens|Derek Francis|John Welsh|Victor Brooks|Geoffrey Frederick|Clifford Elkin|Julie Mendez
title: El inspector
